sentence: In the race for Governor of Georgia, incumbent Brian Kemp has an 11-point lead over former Senate candidate David Perdue, 43% to 32%; 17% are undecided.
title: Democrats Raise Red Flags Over That Photo Op Of Herschel Walker (R) & Clarence Thomas
